"The Great Debate" - A musical about the 2020 US Presidential Election, featuring songs that explore the different viewpoints and issues at play.
"The Last Supper" - A musical retelling of the biblical story of the Last Supper, featuring original music that brings the story to life in a new and engaging way.
"The Time Traveler's Guide" - A musical about a time traveler who goes back to different eras in history and learns valuable lessons about the human condition.
"The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes" - A musical adaptation of the classic detective stories by Sir Arthur Conan Doyle, featuring original music that captures the spirit of the original stories.
"The Great Gatsby: The Musical" - A musical adaptation of F. Scott Fitzgerald's classic novel, featuring original music that captures the glamour and decadence of the Roaring Twenties.
